Michigan Democrats challenge Biden, DNC on GazaU.S. President Joe Biden faces two long-shot opponents in Michigan's Democratic primary race on Tuesday, but his biggest challenge comes from a group of previous supporters who are asking voters to mark "uncommitted" on their ballots. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:11:15 GMT A72CKOSSDRJHPDCJFNE7OW35GA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/michigan-democrats-challenge-biden-dnc-gaza-2024-02-27/Andrea Shalal, Nandita Bose世界美国
Insight: Inside the Democratic rebellion against Biden over the Gaza warThe depth of Democratic Party anger over President Joe Biden’s handling of the Gaza war has caught his campaign off guard and could depress support in November’s election, according to Reuters interviews with more than a dozen senior party and campaign officials and five dozen voters and activists. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:07:49 GMT 66X2OPWPKJKN3FT3BMMRX7JVNA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/inside-democratic-rebellion-against-biden-over-gaza-war-2024-02-27/Andrea Shalal, Nandita Bose, Kat Stafford世界美国
U.N. says Israeli forces stalled evacuation convoy, forced paramedics to stripThe United Nations humanitarian office (OCHA) said on Tuesday the Israeli military had stalled a medical evacuation convoy in the city of Khan Younis in southern Gaza, detaining a paramedic and forcing others to remove their clothes. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 12:02:47 GMT GLM3KKQ7WRLFRPYNEXSVWIMOMA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-says-israeli-forces-stalled-evacuation-convoy-forced-paramedics-strip-2024-02-27/Reuters世界中东
Dutch mega trial ends in life sentence for gang leader Ridouan TaghiOne of the largest criminal trials in Dutch history ended on Tuesday with the main defendant, Ridouan Taghi, sentenced to life in prison for ordering a series of gangland killings. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 11:34:34 GMT XPKQYWIOBRPHZKWAP5HBI43OPA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-mega-trial-ends-life-sentence-gang-leader-ridouan-taghi-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Man jailed in Russian-annexed Crimea for 'rehabilitating Nazism'A court in Russian-annexed Crimea has sentenced a man to two-and-a-half years in prison for "rehabilitating Nazism", the regional Investigative Committee said on Tuesday, amid a crackdown on behaviour deemed unpatriotic since the start of the war in Ukraine. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:51:30 GMT FKM4HOPNANJSNPECHUEWXV4VKU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/man-jailed- Russian-annexed-crimea-rehabilitating-nazism-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
German police arrest long-sought alleged Red Army Faction militantDaniela Klette, a member of Germany's notorious Red Army Faction (RAF) militant group, has been arrested in Berlin after decades on the run from armed robbery and attempted murder charges, prosecutors said on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:50:44 GMT ABKJ2Y3SFJMMPAUQ6VZ37P3DOU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-officials-trying-confirm-identity-alleged-raf-militant-custody-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine welcomes West's discussion of direct intervention, Russia warns against itA senior Ukrainian official on Tuesday welcomed talk of European nations sending troops to Ukraine, but the Kremlin said a conflict between Russia and NATO would become inevitable if European members of the alliance sent in troops to fight. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:45:46 GMT CP356UO3QFP2DPSLR3R7OB6JII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-welcomes-wests-discussion-direct-intervention-Russia-warns-against-it-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Czechs, Poles not considering troops for UkrainePoland and the Czech Republic on Tuesday said they are not considering sending troops to Ukraine after that option for European nations was mentioned at a meeting in Paris, but they agreed to cooperate on buying more ammunition for Kyiv. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:40:43 GMT UXSZSCIBBFLMNINCHDFVTHZPII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/czechs-poles-not-considering-sending-troops-ukraine-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Kremlin warns of conflict with NATO if alliance troops fight in UkraineThe Kremlin warned on Tuesday that conflict between Russia and the U.S.-led NATO military alliance would be inevitable if European members of NATO sent troops to fight in Ukraine. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:23:36 GMT PAHKXC4LRFJA5DOBWDCODFA5VE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-warns-conflict-with-nato-if-alliance-troops-fight-ukraine-2024-02-27/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Brazil's Lula spotlights Global South in G20 presidencyBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has set his sights on giving the Global South a larger voice in world decision-making, using his country's presidency this year of the G20 group of largest economies. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 10:03:49 GMT HK7WPU2NZVNADA6YIRNMRRAWTPY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-lula-spotlights-global-south-g20-presidency-2024-02-27/Lisandra Paraguassu, Leika Kihara, Marcela Ayres世界美洲
Russia jails rights campaigner Orlov for 2-1/2 yearsVeteran human rights activist Oleg Orlov was sentenced on Tuesday by a Moscow court to two and a half years in prison after he was found guilty of discrediting Russian's armed forces in a trial that has been condemned by international observers as politically motivated. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 09:37:05 GMT ZDQZ5TZGNKIZC25LJMWKBGLB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-jails-rights-campaigner-orlov-2-12-years-2024-02-27/Reuters世界欧洲
